article_title: Cruz’s blistering New Year’s Eve message includes bold predictions for 2016

og.description: Republican presidential candidate Ted Cruz delivered a blistering New Year’s message on Thursday night. Appearing on Fox News Channel’s New Year’s Eve special, the Texas Senator predicted that “2016 is going to be an incredible year,” while he slammed President Obama and Democratic candidate Hillary Clinton. Cruz delivered a rundown of all the great things in store …
og.title: Cruz’s blistering New Year's Eve message includes bold predictions for 2016

article_summary:
Republican presidential candidate Ted Cruz delivered a blistering New Year’s message on Thursday night.
God Bless you #TedCruz #TrusTed — Sandi Williams ن (@knikhusky) January 1, 2016@FoxNews @tedcruz This was awesome.
Appearing on Fox News Channel’s New Year’s Eve special, the Texas Senator predicted that “2016 is going to be an incredible year,” while he slammed President Obama and Democratic candidate Hillary Clinton.
Cruz delivered a rundown of all the great things in store for the upcoming year, saying “2016 is going to be the last year of the Obama presidency.
U pick — Sal Richa (@RichaSally) January 1, 2016But there were plenty of people who loved what Cruz had to say too:@FoxNews @tedcruz LOVE THIS!!!
